description: This header file defines a mock class for the IRuntimeManager interface used for testing purposes in a software project. It includes mock methods for runtime management functionalities such as Register, Unregister, Run, Hibernate, Wake, Suspend, Resume, Terminate, Kill, GetInfo, Annotate, Mount, and Unmount. The mock class is intended to simulate runtime manager behavior in unit tests.

classes.name: RuntimeManagerMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the IRuntimeManager interface for unit testing.

classes.name: RuntimeManagerNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the IRuntimeManager::INotification interface for testing notification callbacks.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of a notification callback.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the deregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: Run
methods.description: Mocks starting an application or process with specified parameters.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Mocks putting an application into hibernate state.

methods.name: Wake
methods.description: Mocks waking an application from hibernate with specified runtime state.

methods.name: GetInfo
methods.description: Mocks retrieving info about an application instance.

methods.name: Annotate
methods.description: Mocks adding annotations or metadata to an application instance.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Mocks adding a reference for the mock object.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Mocks releasing a reference for the mock object.

methods.name: QueryInterface
methods.description: Mocks querying for a specific interface on the mock object.
